intro: Psychotria sonocorova, commonly known as the Sonocorova Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its dark green, oval-shaped leaves and clusters of small, white flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in the understory of tropical rainforests. Due to its ornamental value and ecological significance, it is sometimes cultivated in botanical gardens and conservation programs.
